articles.author: Richard Speed
articles.title: ChatGPT starts spouting nonsense in 'unexpected responses' shocker - The Register
articles.description: Skips the 'intelligence' part of generative AI
articles.content:
Sometimes generative AI systems can spout gibberish, as OpenAI's ChatGPT chatbot users discovered last night.
OpenAI noted, "We are investigating reports of unexpected responses from ChatGPT" at 234… [+2530 chars]

articles.author: Arslan Ali
articles.title: Natural Gas and Oil Analysis: Market Treads Amidst 8% NG Jump & Global Unrest - FX Empire
articles.description: Amidst global tensions and economic uncertainties, NG’s 8% jump underscores the volatile interplay between supply disruptions and market resilience.
articles.content: In todays analysis of UKOIL, the price slightly declined to $82.61, a 0.04% decrease. The pivot point at $82.07 is crucial for the days sentiment. Resistance levels are noted at $84.00, $85.78, and $… [+501 chars]
